backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing card management with access control, user‑scoped card storage, ID generation, and functions to add cards and query a user’s cards.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend change adding a purchase‑total metric to the sold‑cards balance UI.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated human‑written summaries of all major frontend files including pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions providing OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, actor initialization, profile loading with timeouts, and rendering main pages or setup screens.
frontend/src/components/AddCardDialog.ts: Dialog form for creating new cards with text inputs, suggestion‑based autocompletion, and submission via useAddCard.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Reusable text input with dropdown suggestions, filtering, outside‑click handling, and selection behavior.
frontend/src/components/CardItem.tsx: Displays a card with rarity styling, pricing info, and actions for editing, selling/trading, or deleting.
frontend/src/components/CraftedCardsModa: Shows a modal listing crafted cards with rarity badges, purchase details, and card metadata.
frontend/src/components/EditCardDialog.t: Provides a form dialog to edit all card properties and submit updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches UI errors and displays a recovery screen with optional technical details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding and login/logout controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their profile name on first setup.
frontend/src/components/SellOrTradeDialo: Dialog for selling or trading a card, including sale input fields and adding new cards in trades.
frontend/src/components/SoldCardsModal.t: Modal component that displays sold and traded cards with profit calculations and expandable trade details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts: Empty placeholder for Google authentication hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, stored identity loading, and an authentication provider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, cards, and related backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark theme design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CardsPage.tsx: Page showing user cards with search, filtering, and an add-card dialog.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Portfolio dashboard component loading investment, transaction, and card metrics, computing profit/loss and sold-card purchase totals, and rendering summary UI with modals.
frontend/src/utils/cardSuggestions.ts: Utility functions to extract unique card-field values and filter suggestions for country, league, club, and season.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests and issues related to sold-card balance and Essence purchase-cost handling.
